mapper.sql: ID AS id, Car_Business_Id AS CarBusinessId, Car_Business_After_Id AS CarBusinessAfterId, Trance_Content AS TranceContent, Trance_Name AS TranceName, Trance_Date AS TranceDate, status, litigation_status AS litigationStatus, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, log_type AS logType, is_delete AS isDelete, is_transmission_platform AS isTransmissionPlatform
mapper.select: SELECT tt.ID AS id, tt.Car_Business_Id AS CarBusinessId, tt.Car_Business_After_Id AS CarBusinessAfterId, tt.Trance_Content AS TranceContent, tt.Trance_Name AS TranceName, tt.Trance_Date AS TranceDate, tt.status, tt.litigation_status AS litigationStatus, tt.create_user AS createUser, tt.create_time AS createTime, tt.log_type AS logType, tt.is_delete AS isDelete, tt.is_transmission_platform AS isTransmissionPlatform FROM tb_parametertracelog tt WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_collection_track_log log WHERE log.xd_index_id = tt.ID)
